attributes.action: stop the council giving the OK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We don't need any new mosque's of any size to be built in the Dudley Borough area, this was proved when a large majority petition from local people was handed in last year (2006).So sign below and once again have your say.
The council were in the wrong by selling the land in the first place for a cut price to the Muslim community

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
